question: What is the name of the application launched by the Ministry of Tourism along with the Quality Council of India?
explanation:
The Ministry of Tourism has launched the SAATHI application, along with the Quality Council of India, on the occasion of World Tourism Industry.
The application is expected to assist the hospitality industry, in maintaining the safety standards and operations, which would develop confidence among staff. A film named ‘Pathik’ on Incredible India Tourist Facilitators Certification Programme (IITFC) was also launched.
